description: Help Menu - In-game reference organized by topic (Rooms, Inhabitants, Combat, Resources, Victory) with search function, tutorial replay link, and data-driven content.

userStories.title: Create Help menu component with section navigation
userStories.description: As a player, I want to access a Help menu with organized sections so that I can browse game information by topic.
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Help' button exists on the main menu screen and during gameplay (toolbar or pause menu)
Clicking opens the Help menu as an overlay/panel that can be closed
Help sections: Rooms, Inhabitants, Combat, Resources, Victory accessible via tabs or sidebar
Sections are collapsible/expandable with brief overview followed by detailed subsections
Component uses OnPush change detection and standalone conventions
Uses @for native control flow to render sections dynamically
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create help content for all sections
userStories.description: As a player, I want comprehensive help content covering rooms, inhabitants, combat, resources, and victory conditions.
acceptanceCriteria: Rooms section covers: room types and functions, placement rules, feature attachment, room connections; room descriptions loaded from gamedata where possible
Inhabitants section covers: types with key stats, recruitment, assignment, stats, leveling, combat roles
Combat section covers: invasion mechanics, defense strategies, combat stats, Fear effects, turn-based flow
Resources section covers: all resource types, production, consumption, storage, Corruption and Fear mechanics
Victory section covers: all five victory paths with exact threshold conditions
Help content stored as structured data (YAML or JSON) for easy editing
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement help search and tutorial replay link
userStories.description: As a player, I want to search help content and replay the tutorial so that I can quickly find information or refresh basics.
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar at the top of the Help menu filters content to matching sections/subsections
Search matches against titles, body text, and keywords
Results highlight matching text; clearing search restores full section list
A 'Replay Tutorial' button exists in the Help menu
Clicking it closes the Help menu and starts the tutorial from Step 1
Typecheck passes
